skillTree.localised_description: The Great Hound of War thirsts eternally for blood and slaughter, its rage manifesting itself in the unstoppable martial spirit of its warriors.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +12
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Dining upon the blood of slaughtered enemies may attract the notice, and maybe the favour, of the Hound.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +15

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The chosen of the Blood God leave burning cities in their wake, exerting Khorne's savage dominion over the mortal plane.

effects.description:
Khorne Authority: +2
	(Lord's army)

Slaanesh Authority: -2
	(Lord's army)

Khorne Authority: +3
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%

Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This blood-forged axe is a sign of Khorne's favour, and unerringly severs heads with bloody sweeps so that yet more skulls might be laid at Khorne's feet.

effects.description: Ability: "Axe of Khorne"

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: The bearer wears around his neck a tiny brass skull filled with the blood of a Daemon Prince of Khorne. When the Bloodskull's contents are tasted, the bearer becomes a maelstrom of violence.

effects.description: Ability: "Bloodskull Pendant"

skillTree.localised_description: Haargroth's frenzy in the name of Khorne is such that a cloud of ruddy mist surrounds him, inducing an uncontrollable fury in everyone nearby.

effects.description: Ability: "Blood Fever"

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: Haargroth's victories are beyond counting, and the plunder he has reaped from his raids has made the Graelings wealthy, and made many flock to his banner.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Khorne Marked units

Recruitment cost: -10% for Khorne Marked units

Recruitment cost: -30% for Khorne Marked units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Lost completely to the unholy fury that dwells in the blood of his people, Haargroth is a blood-maddened slaughterer, representing his foul deity in pure microcosm.

effects.description: Armour: +25
Unit mass: +25%
Ability: "Gorefeast"

skillTree.localised_description: The Spelleater Shield is made from daemonhide stretched across a framework made from the bones of a Liche, its surface heavily adorned with symbols of power. When spells are cast against the bearer, it drains away their power.

effects.description: Ability: "Spelleater Shield"

skillTree.localised_description: A dedicated warrior of Khorne knows no joy but the thrill of battle and bloodshed.

effects.description:
Khorne Authority: +1
	(Lord's army)
Passive ability: "Icon of Endless War"

skillTree.localised_description: What magic can penetrate the searing hatred within the minds of the Blood God's most brutal followers.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Paragon of Carnage"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: 10%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5%
Charge bonus: +5

skillTree.localised_description: No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!

effects.description: Melee attack: +4
Weapon strength: +3%
Melee attack: +8
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.localised_description: "KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"

effects.description: Melee defence: +4
Weapon strength: +3%
Melee defence: +8
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.localised_description: "Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"

effects.description: Leadership: +4
Weapon strength: +3%
Leadership: +8
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.localised_description: With every other thought squeezed from their mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3%
Physical resistance: 5%
Weapon strength: +6%
Physical resistance: 10%
Ability: "Bloodthirst"

skillTree.localised_description: Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.

effects.description: Hit points: +5%
Weapon strength: +3%
Hit points: +10%
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.localised_description: "None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"

effects.description: Speed: +5%
Weapon strength: +3%
Speed: +10%
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.localised_description: "Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."

effects.description: Melee attack: +4
Weapon strength: +3%

Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.localised_description: All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3%

skillTree.localised_description: The raging winds draw forth a Bloodthirster to savage the ill-omened opponents of the Murder Lord.

effects.description:
Army ability: "Greater Gate of Khorne"
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

skillTree.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

skillTree.localised_description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

skillTree.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.

effects.description: Ability: "Fight or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
